item.description:
Meeting place for local GameMasters and Players for Role-Playing games of all types, beyond the already existing D&D/D20 group.
Fans of all system - commercial or homebrew - is welcome, from Amber, Chivalry & Sorcery, GUPRS, HarnMaster, HARP, Riddle of Steel to RoleMaster or the amazing new RPG you've been developing for so long.
Discuss RPG rules and design, as well as Settings from the fantastic, such as Robert E. Howard's "Conan" and J. R. R. Tolkien's Middle-Earth, over historical ages as the Middle-Ages, Renaissance or the Napoleonic area to name a few, to Science-Fiction in all it's forms.
item.name: Role-Playing Fellowship of Greater Boston
